overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description: Ziyo International Enterprise began as a focused trading and resource development firm with a clear vision: to responsibly unlock Pakistan's mineral potential and connect it with global markets. The company was formally restructured as a Private Limited entity in 2025 to support expansion, transparency, and international collaboration.

2020.title: Foundation
2020.description: Company founded with focus on mineral trading and resource sourcing. Built relationships with local communities and stakeholders.

2022.title: Expansion
2022.description: Secured mining agreements and partnerships. Developed scalable production models and established logistics routes.

2024.title: Operations
2024.description: Active production across multiple sites. Initiated feasibility studies for copper ore grading and beneficiation.

2025.title: Restructuring
2025.description: Formal restructuring as Private Limited company. Enhanced transparency and investor-ready corporate structure.

2026.title: Growth
2026.description: Processing plant development. Expanding production capacity and international market penetration.
